alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Dawson; Gosper; Greeley; Howard; Sherman; Valley (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 03 at 2:42AM CST until January 03 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...ICE STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Heavy snow on top of ice. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 8 inches, on top of at least a light glaze of ice. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of central and south central Nebraska. * WHEN...Until noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on extremely hazardous road conditions. Gusty winds will cause power outages due to accumulated ice and snow. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Mixed precipitation will quickly change to moderate to, at times, heavy snow early this morning. Up to 1.5" snow rate, per hour, will be possible through mid-morning. Highest snow accumulations will be north of a line from Lexington to Greeley.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Buffalo; Dawson; Gosper; Greeley; Howard; Sherman; Valley
